Text: Copy gift certificate and eCard sent to ElizabethGreetings from Amazoncom To view a copy of the gift certificate and eCard you sent to Elizabeth just click on the link below or simply copy and paste the Web address into your browser address window and hit Enter execobidosecardpickupisrecipno To send another eCard just click on the link below execobidossubstcardshomehomehtml Thanks for using Amazoncom eCards Sincerely Amazoncom Customer Service Need another way to view your eCard Click on the link below or copy and paste the full address into your browser execobidossubstcardstemplatescardspickupsenderformhtml Then enter your eCard code provided below in the box to view your eCard and gift certificate Your eCard code As an eCard sender youll occasionally receive email updates about important functionality changes to the web site new Amazoncom services and special offers we believe would be beneficial to you If youd rather not receive this information please visit your Amazoncom Subscriptions page subscriptions
